QuestData.Title: Trollin' For Volunteers
QuestData.Description: Vol'jin has given me his war drums and put me in charge of trainin' da new recruits here. Only problem is we be short on new recruits.$B$BSupposin' I loaned ya dis drum, would ya use it to sound de call to war on Vol'jin's behalf in Razor Hill? If ya could even inspire just a few trolls to join da cause, it would make a difference. Once ya've convinced dem to volunteer, bring dem back to me for trainin'. Go over an' talk to Handler Marnlek to de south. He can lend you a bat for de ride to Razor Hill.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Vol'jin's War Drums to recruit 5 Troll Citizens in Razor Hill.$B$BYou can speak to Handler Marnlek for a bat ride to Razor Hill.
QuestData.RewardText: Ya found some good ones. I be trainin' them hard and we won't stop until we've driven Zalazane from our islands.

Objectives.Objective: Troll Volunteers delivered to Champion Uru'zin
